Expert Knowledge
Notes: For all attributes we used expert knowledge from members of this team to ensure that data reported is consistent with observed species attributes in the field. For some attributes (e.g. seed maturation time and fleshy fruit) for the less commonly published species, particularly at LUQ, we relied on expert knowledge, predominately from members of this team but also from other scientists.
